end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing! Get started with the `[p]covidgraph` command once you've loaded the cog.

This cog has docs! Check them out at <https://go.vexcodes.com/c/covidgraph>
name: CovidGraph
